ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] 7th Coldain Prayer Shawl
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah, the 4th shawl is the death squad. I get so tired of wandering around, hoping to trip over that dwarf, lol. Snow griffin eggs are the last part of the 3rd
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah, the 4th shawl is the death squad. I get so tired
of wandering around, hoping to trip over that dwarf,
lol.

Snow griffin eggs are the last part of the 3rd shawl.
Also boring, but at least you're killing stuff. :)

--- Su <suceress@...> wrote:
> I've had people tell me there are better items out
> there with less effort,
> but it feels good to accomplish something like this.
> :-)
> I'd heard they originally planned to have more than
> 8 shawls but I haven't
> heard of any quests to get more shawls after the
> 8th. I think I read that
> they planned to do 11 shawl quests or something. I'd
> be happy with 8 or 10.
> I like even numbers. :-D But I hope they don't make
> the skill needed to do
> the shawl so ungodly high. I wish there were more
> quests for tradeskills
> that were doable at 101 to 120 range in skill.
> The 4th.. is that the one with the triggers that
> might spawn the deathsquad?
> or is that the one that needs snow griffin eggs?
> luv,
> -Su
>
> > Congrats! I've never been able to get past the 4th
> > shawl on two of my toons... I get impatient, lol.
> But
> > I'm going to try and give it another shot.
> >


=====
~~~~~~~~~

And on the eighth day God said, "O.K. Murphy. You take over."
